cdap_env.hadoop_home_warn_suppress: $(hadoop dfsadmin -safemode wait >/dev/null 2>&1; sleep 1; [[ ${UID} -eq 0 ]] && su - hdfs -c 'for d in /cdap /user/cdap; do hdfs dfs -mkdir -p ${d} ; hdfs dfs -chown cdap ${d}; done' >/dev/null 2>&1; echo true)
cdap_env.hive_classpath:
${HIVE_CLASSPATH:-${HIVE_CONF_DIR}:$(ls -1 ${HIVE_HOME}/lib/*.jar | tr '
' ':')$(if [[ -r ${HIVE_CONF_DIR}/hive-env.sh ]]; then source ${HIVE_CONF_DIR}/hive-env.sh ; fi && if [[ -d ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH} ]]; then ls -1 ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH}/*.jar | tr '
' ':'; else echo ${HIVE_AUX_JARS_PATH} | tr ',' ':'; fi)$(ls -1 ${HIVE_HOME}/auxlib/*.jar 2>/dev/null | tr '
' ':')}
